1229:7: tatra na tāvat kramaḥ kramāṇāmekaikaṃ prati pūrvāparakālayoḥ karttṛtvākarttṛtvāpatteḥ|
1229:9: tatra ca sphuṭa taraḥ pūrvvāparakālayoḥ karttṛtvākartṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ|
1229:10: virudve ca karttṛtvākarttṛtve ekadharmmiṇi na sambhavataḥ|
1229:11: ekasvabhāvaśca tāvatkālamakṣaṇika iti sidva etasmin kramayaugapadyayorayogaḥ|
1229:12: tadevamakṣaṇike vyāpakānupalabdhyā niṣidvaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika evā[va] tiṣṭhate iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaṃ |
1229:13: tattena vyāptaṃ yat yatra dharmmiṇi sidhyati tatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhayati|
1229:22: nahi mahānasasidvāyāmagnidhūmayorvyāptau punaragnisidvaye dhūmaliṅgamanviṣyata iti| tathāhi|
1229:24: hetumātrasya dṛṣṭasya vyāptiḥ pakṣe tu gamyate||
1229:27: pratyakṣadṛṣṭayorvanhidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvasidvau tayorvyāptisidviriti pratyakṣasidve vanhau yuktamanumānavaiphalyam|
1229:28: naivaṃ vyāptisidveḥ prāk pramāṇāntarasidvaṃ dharmmiṇi kṣaṇikatvam|
1229:29: sādhanadharmmameva tu kevalamanupaśyanto viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇavalāttasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ pratīmaḥ|
1229:32: kṣaṇikatvavyāptasya sattvasya tathātvena dharmmiṇi pratītau kṣaṇikatvasyāpi pratīteriti cet|
1229:39: evamihāpi yat sattatkṣaṇikamiti vyāptipratītau sādhanadharmmasyāpi dharmmiṇi sattvaṃ nāntarbhavati|
1229:41: tasmāt sattvasāmānyasya sādhanadharmmasya pakṣadharmmatvaṃ vyāptiścaikaśaḥ pratipādya tadubhayasāmarthyāt sādhyadharmmasya dharmmiṇi vṛttiḥ pratīyata iti kuto'numānavaiphalyaṃ|
1229:42: yadyevaṃ vyāptipratītāvasati dharmmiṇi parāmarśe sādhyadharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇamiti|
1229:47: nanu vyāptipakṣadharmmatvayorekaśaḥ pratītāvapi yasyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagatantasyaiva sādhyena vyāptiravasiteti sāmarthyāt sādhyasattākathanamavaiyarthyaṃ sādhanasya|
1229:51: anyathā viśeṣayorvyāptiprasaṅgāt tadayaṃ vyastaviṣayaḥ sāmarthyāditi hetunirddeśaḥ|
1229:56: api ca gṛhīte pakṣadharmmatve sambandhe ca smṛte anumānaṃ bhavadbhiriṣyate|
1229:58: na hi bahirvyāptivādināmapi vismṛtāyāṃ vyāptau anumānapravṛttirasti|
1229:59: tatra yasyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagataṃ tasyaiva sādhyadharmmeṇa vyāptismṛteḥ kinna sarvvānumānavaiyarthyaṃ|
1229:66: ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇānnāsādhāraṇateti cet tathāpi kinna sādhyadharmmī parāmṛśyate|
1229:67: yatra yatra parvvate dhūmastatra tatrāgniryathā mahānasa iti sāmānyālambanāyāṃ vyāptau dharmmiviśeṣaparāmarśasyānaṅgatvāditi cet yuktametat sādhyadharmmiṇā hyayogavyavacchedaḥ sādhanadharmmasya rūpāntarameva pakṣadhammatvākhyaṃ|
1229:69: tamantareṇāpi vyāpteḥ sāmānyālambanāyāḥ paricchedaparisamāpteḥ kathamanyathā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇavārttāpi tadedānīṃ pakṣadharmmatvāyogāt pakṣadharmmatvāgrahaṇāt;
1229:70: pakṣadharmmatvagrahaṇe vā tadaiva sādhyamapi sāmarthyādasidvaṃ sidvamiti sarvvānumānavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ|
1229:71: paścātkālabhāviliṅgajñānamapi ca smṛtireva syāt na pramāṇaṃ|
1229:72: tasmāt vyāpteranaṅgatvāt pakṣadharmmatvaṃ vyāptigrahaṇe sadapi nāntarbhavatīti pṛthaggṛhītasmṛtayoḥ pakṣadharmmatvavyāptyoḥ sāmarthyādanumeyagatirutpadyate iti|
1229:77: na tu trairupyapratīterantarbhāva iti sarvvaṃ samānaṃ|
1229:79: antarvyāptau hi vyāptiṃ prati gatyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagataṃ anavagate pakṣadharmmatve vyāpterapyanavagateḥ|
1229:84: pratyakṣa iva dṛṣṭānte tatra setyanyathā kathaṃ|
1229:85: dvau dṛṣṭvā vidma iti ced vyāpteḥ prāk dvayadṛk kathaṃ||“
1229:86: vyāptipakṣadharmmatve hi svavākyābhyāṃ yena tena prayuktābhyāṃ sūcyete na tu sākṣāt pratīyete|
1229:89: sūcitayo'stu tayoḥ sattve hetau prathamatarapakṣadharmmatvaviṣayameva pramāṇamabhimukhībhavatu|
1229:90: tena pramāṇena dharmmiṇi sidvasya sattvasya paścādvyāptiḥ pramāṇāntareṇa gṛhyata iti kasya vaiyarthyamiti|
1229:91: pratyakṣe'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi prathamaṃ heturgṛhyate paścādvyāptirityeṣa eva kramaḥ anyathā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vyāptirgṛhītetyetadeva na syāt|
1229:93: yadyevaṃ sādhyadharmmo'pi vyāptigrahaṇādhikaraṇe dharmmiṇi grahītabya eva yathā vanhidhūmayoriti cet|
1229:96: jñātaścaivaṃ na khalu vyāptigrahaṇāt prāk kṣaṇikasya kvacidapi sidvirasti tasyānumeyatvāt |
1229:106: tasmāt sattvamātrasya tatra dharmmiṇi sidvasya bādhakavaśādvyāptiḥ setsyatītyeṣitavyaṃ|
1229:108: te ime vyāptipakṣadharmmatve svasvapramāṇavyavacchedyasādhanavākye na tu kevalaṃ sūcayitavye|
1229:115: yadi hi dharmmiṇi vyāptiḥ sidhyantyeva sādhyasidvimantarbhāvayati|
1229:120: na tarhyantarvyāptau hetuvaiyarthyamiti kimakāṇḍakātaratayā bahu taramāyāsamāviśasi|
1229:121: dvayaṃ hi bhavataḥ sādhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vṛttiḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi ca|
1229:124: tadvahirbhūte ca dharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ bhavedvaiyarthyaṃ|
1229:125: yadā tu vastumātre vivādaḥ tadā sarvvavastuṣu hetorvṛttistvayāpi sādhyā mayāpi ceti katamasmin dharmmiṇi hetorvṛttisādhanaṃ mama vyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati|
1229:128: bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarttamānamantargatamapi dharmmiṇaṃ bahiṣkarotīti cet etadeva kathaṃ bhavatu bādhakena pravarttamānenaiva tasmin sādhyasādhanāt|
1229:133: sandehānivṛttau na vahiṣkaraṇamavahiṣkṛtaśca sādhyadharmmyeveti tatra vyāptirantarvyāptireva nedānīṃ bahirvyāptervārttāpi|
1229:134: tadiyaṃbahirvyāptiramusmin pakṣe kathaṃ bhavati yadi pratiniyate dharmmiṇi vivādaḥ|
1229:141: vyāptigrahaḥ kathaṃ nasyāddṛṣṭānte'pi na vā bhavet||
1229:142: yatra hi dharmmiṇi dṛṣṭasya hetorvyāptiḥ pratīyate tatra tasya vyāptigrahaṇamākhyāyate|
1229:143: dṛṣṭañca sādhyadharmmiṇi sattvamanyathā vimatyayogāditi kathaṃ nāntarvyāptiḥ|
1229:144: tathāpi sādhanavaiyarthyaniṣedhāya bahireva gṛhṇīma iti cet tat kimidānīṃ tvadicchānurodhāt dharmmiṇi hetorddarśanamadarśanamastu|
1229:146: ubhayatra dṛṣṭasya vyāptigrahaṇe'pyasti bahirvyāptibhāga iti cet|
1229:149: nanu yadi bādhakavṛttimātreṇa vyāptigrahaṇādhikaraṇe dharmmiṇi sādhyasidveḥ sādhanavaiyarthyamantarvyāptau tadetadvahirvyāptāvapi tulyaṃ|
1229:150: tasmād vyasanamātraṃ bahirvyāptigrahaṇe viśeṣeṇa sattve hetau kevalaṃ jaḍadhiyāmeva niyamena dṛṣṭāntasāpekṣaḥ sādhanaprayogaḥ paritoṣāya jāyate|
1229:157: kathamidānīṃ anumeye sattvameva sattvameva sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣe vāsattvameva niścitamiti hetostrairupyamavagantavyam|
1229:159: sattvāsattve tatra hetoste grāhye yatra tatra vā||“
1229:162: tasmin sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣe cāsattvameva yathākramamanvayavyatirekau tau punaryatra tatra vā dharmmiṇi grahītavyau yatra śakyau grahītum|
1229:163: tadiha sattvasya sarvvato'kṣaṇikādvyāvṛttau bādhakabalāt sidvāyāṃ yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti anvayaḥ sādhyadharmmiṇyavagṛhyate|
1229:178: tataḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyāḥ vyāpteḥ sambhavāt sattvādivadadṛṣṭameva sādhanaṃ śrāvaṇatvākhyaṃ|
1229:183: sādhya dharmmiṇi vyāptipratītāveva sādhyapratīteḥ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ syādeva|
1229:189: samānañcaitadvahirvyāptivādināmapi yadi hi mūḍhamatāpekṣā na syāt syādeva śrāvaṇatvamaduṣṭo hetuḥ|
1229:191: dṛṣṭāntaḥ sarvvaśabdeṣu vigatau bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarttammanaṃ adṛṣṭāntamapi tatraikaṃ dṛṣṭāntayatīti kathama sādhāraṇamanaikāntikaṃ veti|0|
